sys_script_include.name: getUsersWith2Devices

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e843467347f831109c658f22736d4365
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.getUsersWith2Devices</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getUsersWith2Devices</name><script><![CDATA[var getUsersWith2Devices = Class.create();
getUsersWith2Devices.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

getUserWithBothAssets: function() {
var arry = [];
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
var lap = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_computer');
lap.addQuery('assigned_to', gr.getValue('sys_id'));
lap.query();
if (lap.next()) {
var ph = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_ip_phone');
ph.addQuery('assigned_to', gr.getValue('sys_id'));
ph.query();
if (ph.next()) {
arry.push(gr.getValue('sys_id')+'');
}
}
}
return arry.toString();
}   
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-28 16:15:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>e843467347f831109c658f22736d4365</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getUsersWith2Devices</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e843467347f831109c658f22736d4365</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-28 16:15:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
